m.marble-sense: חנן:002001002020:Merciful:to be kindly disposed;to be generous;to be merciful;to be gracious;to pity
עשׂה:002002002005:Exist>002003003009:Engage:to do;to perform;to commit;to practice;to observe;to celebrate;to keep
צדק:002003003013:Innocent:to be righteous;to prove to be righteous;to be just;to be in the right;to be innocent
ידע:002004002007:Know:to make known;to show;to inform;to tell;to teach
